LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.label: tunnel invasion
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.letterText:
You've picked up seismic disturbances coming from deep underground.

A highly-trained team of Ratkin guerrillas are tunneling right under your feet, and will soon emerge inside your settlement.

Stop them before they cripple all your facilities!
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.label: ratkin hole
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.letterText: You've discovered a rat hole.\n\nDestroy it before a Ratkin thief uses it to plunder your settlement!
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.label: enemy reinforcements
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.letterText: Barely moments after the tremendous EMP explosion, a group of enemy Ratkin commandos lying in wait have emerged.\n\nPrepare to defend yourselves!
